amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the conventional energy account at the Bureau of Ocean Energy Management (BOME) by $5,434,000 and increase funding for oil spill response programs by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Bureau of Ocean Energy Management by $5,434,000 and to increase funding for Inland Oil Spill Programs by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 243 (Roll no. 394).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 243 (Roll no. 394).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mrs. Capps.
